document.discussion_title: Lamborghini Centenario Roadster Announced - Geeky Gadgets
document.topic_text: By Roland Hutchinson The Lamborghini Centenario was announced earlier this year and now Lamborghini have unveiled a convertible version, the Lamborghini Centenario Roadster. The Centenario Roadster is already sold out, just 20 cars are being made and each one will cost €2 million plus taxes. The new Lamborghini Centenario Roadster comes w a V12 engine and a massive 770 horsepower, it also features a carbon fibre monocoque and body. ‘Lamborghini prides itself on the relentless pursuit of experimentation. We are proud to unleash Centenario’s further potential in the form of a classic roadster; the perfect harmony between innovation an d timeless design. This unique engineering achievement is a befitting tribute to Lamborghini’s extraordinary past and a preview of its brilliant future. Centenario Roadster embraces the cutting edge characteristics of its coupé sibling and embraces the freedom of a true open-top super sports car for a pure drive experience’’ Stefano Domenicali, Automobili Lamborghini Chief Executive Officer, said. You can find out more details about the new Lamborghini Centenario Roadster over at Lamborghini at the link below.
